mapper.insert: insert into promotion (id, `promotionStrategy`, customerLevel, discount, coupon, price,beginTime ) values (#{id}, #{promotionStrategy}, #{customerLevel}, #{discount}, coupon, #{price}, #{beginTime},#{endTime})
mapper.select: select * from promotion where (beginTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}) and (endTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime})
select * from promotion order by id desc limit 0,1;
